    Notes

  • American Pharaoh

    Notes

    The Kentucky Derby champion is the field’s most talented horse, but he also drew the worst starting position.

    Rarely challenged before the Derby, he won five of his six lifetime starts by a combined 23 1⁄4 lengths.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Dortmund

    Notes

    Baffert’s other horse will try to avoid the late fade that doomed him to third place in the Derby.

    Stablemate American Pharoah handed him his first loss at Churchill Downs.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Mr. Z

    Notes

    Legendary trainer D. Wayne Lukas believes strongly enough in this colt that he helped arrange a midweek sale so that he could run in the Preakness.

    Was a late Preakness entry after Zayat Stables sold him to Calumet Farms on Wednesday.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Danzig Moon

    Notes

    The Mark Casse-trained colt finished a solid fifth in the Derby but never showed he could challenge the leaders.

    Is the bay son of Malibu Moon, sire of 2013 Derby winner Orb.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Tale of Verve

    Notes

    He narrowly missed running in the Derby, but trainer Dallas Stewart says he has a shot as a late charger.

    Is the son of Tale of Ekati, 2008 Wood Memorial winner who finished fourth in the Derby and sixth in the Belmont Stakes.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Bodhisattva

    Notes

    He’s a long shot, but Jose Corrales’ horse has won at Pimlico Race Course before, in the April 18 Tesio Stakes.

    Jockey Trevor McCarthy’s dad, Mike, was a leading jockey in the region before becoming a trainer.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Diving Rod

    Notes

    He’s perhaps the strongest new threat to the Derby horses after an impressive win in the Lexington Stakes.

    Has finished in the money in his five career starts, including winning his first race at Laurel Park in late November.

    Earnings

    Previous Start

  • Firing Line

    Notes

    Hall of Fame jockey Gary Stevens likes his chances aboard the consistent, versatile Derby runner-up.

    Has finished first or second in five career starts.

    Earnings

    Previous Start
